pages.text: An $(l:bigreactors/active)actively cooled$(/l) Reactor/Turbine setup vaporizes a coolant using the heat of the Reactor to generate vapor that can be used to drive the rotors of many Turbines and generate energy.$(br2)A $(bold)coolant$() is a fluid that, if recognized, can be pumped into the Coolant Fluid Tank of the Reactor using a $(l:bigreactors/part-forgefluidport)Fluid Port$(/l) in input mode.

A $(bold)vapor$() is a fluid that is the result of a coolant being vaporized inside a Reactor, and it can be pumped from a Reactor to a Turbine (using $(l:bigreactors/part-forgefluidport)Fluid Port$(/l)) to drive the Turbine rotor and then be condensed back to the original coolant, allowing the cycle to start again.$(br2)Only valid coolants and vapors can be used inside a Reactor or a Turbine.
Extreme Reactors register, by default, water as a valid coolant and steam as its resulting vapor.$(br2)Other mods or mod packs can add their own fluids or modify/remove the default ones.
